nodes.text: Dorius Drevin was a bounty hunter who accepted a bounty on the Sullustan Loro Ecls. Posing as a pilgrim of the Fellowship of Kooroo, Drevin joined a group lead by Honarius Hanast who hired a group of free-traders to take them to Gelgelar Free Port. On Gelgelar, Drevin attempted to kill Ecls with a bomb but was stopped by the same group of free-traders.
